quote: His first ever sale as a 21-year-old was for $1.1 million.
why_clipworthy: This moment highlights the potential for young agents to achieve big sales early in their careers.
suggested_hook: Imagine closing a million-dollar deal at just 21!

quote: Whenever you say 'I can't do this,' what you're essentially saying is, 'I'm not making this a priority.'
why_clipworthy: This challenges listeners to rethink their approach to obstacles.
suggested_hook: Is it really that you can't, or just that you won't prioritize it?
